entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
